availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter A. Webb (Meade County, Kentucky, farmer and jailer )

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, farmer and jailer. Kentucky native. Married Carrie V. Morgan Webb in Meade County, Kentucky on October 8, 1865. Farmer in Meade County, Kentucky in 1850. Jailer in Meade County, Kentucky in 1863. Received payment from United States military in 1863 for rations provided to soldiers.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Kentucky District, p. 413. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Meade County, KY, May 1865, p. 533, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Meade County Marriages, Film 000390327, p. 116. KYR-0002-222-0137.
